title: Just wondering how to get level 7
body: Yep! I heard if you post you can unlock 7!

replies.body: Your Boards level and Summoner level are directly linked to each other. Sometimes you just need to post here to make sure they sync up correctly though. YOu can always use the Boards Syncing Tool stickied at the top of Help & Support as well!
i posted this and i'm level 24 now, wow!
